Classic Car Show Lakewood Ranch | Best Sports Bar Manatee County (941) 907-0400 10719 Rodeo Drive, Lakewood Ranch, FL 34202 Menu Cocktail Menu Drink Menu Food Menu Delivery Options DoorDash GrubHub UberEats LWR Events $6 Burger Monday Poker Night Wing Wednesdays Music Trivia Nights Trivia Night Classic Car Show LWR Tuesday Bowl Specials Happy Hour Gift Cards Contact Visit Our Other Locations Blog In the News Review Us Toys for Tots close ORDER NOW CLASSIC CAR SHOW Welcome to Ed's Tavern! We're a local Sports Bar & Restaurant located on Rodeo Drive in Downtown Lakewood Ranch, right next to the Lakewood Ranch Cinema . We are a proud Sponsor of the Classic Car Show, which is a community event that takes place on Main Street on the First Wednesday of Each Month from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. Bring your ride or just enjoy the family-friendly atmosphere while you gaze at the classics! You can bring anything on wheels to participate! It's just $10 per vehicle and there are no restrictions! Oh and don't forget the food, music, and prizes that take place during this event! To participate and to find out more information contact Lance by phone at 941-371-1061 , or by email at lance@collectorcarstv.com . Remember to come on into Ed's to unwind after the event to have one of our local draft beers , wines, or spirits ! Don't leave Ed's without tasting one of our mouth-watering items off of our food menu too! Thank you again for making Ed's Tavern in Lakewood Ranch the Best Sports Bar in Manatee & Sarasota Counties ! Lakewood Ranch 10719 Rodeo Drive Lakewood Ranch, FL 34202 (941) 907-0400 MON - THUR 11:00 am – 12:00 am FRI - SAT 11:00 am – 1:00 am SUN 11:00 am – 11:00 pm © 2025 Ed's Tavern | All Rights Reserved | Privacy Policy | Accessibility | Website Design by DigiSphere Marketing facebook-f google instagram yelp clock bars chevron-down location-dot phone xmark
